headline.main: VICHY SEES RUSSIA NEAR TO DEFEAT; Therefore Time Is Declared at Hand for Reconstruction of Europe by Nazis

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 5 -- While the Vice Premier, Admiral Francois Parian, is again in Paris renewing contacts with the German Authority -- a perfectly normal occurrence, it is insisted here -- public opinion is taking due cognizance of many official manifestations.
abstract: Pub sees need for decision on country's place in new Eur; Cath pub Croix outlines Petain accomplishments in forming authoritarian State
